content: is there such a thing as  chrome extension: add contact directly from search results or maps?

Yes, there are multiple Chrome extensions that allow you to add contacts directly from search results or maps. One popular extension is "FullContact for Gmail & Inbox" which enables you to add contacts from directory listings, search results, or emails. Another extension is "Contactizer" which allows you to add contacts directly from Google search results.

It's always a good idea to carefully review the permissions and ratings of the extension before installing, to ensure it suits your needs and maintains a good reputation.
